column1: #text=Yesterday I went to the nursery and bought a baby apple tree about three feet tall .
#text=I carried it home in my pickup truck .
#text=I grabbed my shovel from the shed and started to dig a hole out in the corner of my backyard .
#text=As I was shoveling I started to hit some rocky soil , and I decided to try the other far back corner of my yard .
#text=The hole took about 45 minutes to dig , and I was exhausted from the work and the heat .
#text=I was able to fit the tree perfectly into the hole and then took a break to drink some lemonade .
#text=After about 15 minutes I started to refill the dirt around the tree .
#text=After packing the dirt down , I saturated the ground around the tree with water .
#text=I hope that the tree is n't too shocked and it actually lives .
